result.ga: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar Phrág
result.orig: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar Phrág
result.html: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar PhrágDo you know Prague well?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil eolas maiṫ agat ar ṖrágDo you know Prague well?

result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.ga: Eolas faoi rún é seo
result.html: Eolas faoi rún é seoThis is confidential information.
result.ponchtml: Eolas faoi rún é seoThis is confidential information.

result.ga: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.html: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheanaYou may know this already.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil sé seo ar eolas agaiḃ ċeanaYou may know this already.

result.ga: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sin
result.orig: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sin
result.html: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sinI know that area.
result.ponchtml: Tá eolas agam ar an ċeantar sinI know that area.

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamhThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag na cláir ṫaiṫí oibre go ḃfaiġiḋ tú eolas ar an obair trí í a ḋéanaṁThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.

result.eng: She will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ga: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.orig: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.html: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ iontas uirṫi cad ċuige a ḃfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
